title: Does anyone know how to get your pill menu bar to go away? Mine is staying on screen during videos
content: Trying to make my menu and back button pill at the bottom of screen disappear like normal, it's staying on screen. I've closed all apps disabled youtubes pip mode turned the phone off and on and forced stopped all apps but still the menu and back button stay on screen. This never usually happens but has one time before but fixed itself after restarting
